website_summaries.verdict: Attacks tangles and knots in hair with dedication.
pros: This spray works well in tackling small tangles that come up when you are styling in your hair
This is another solid choice for multicultural hair types as well

product_meta.title: DevaCurl No Comb Detangling Spray; 8oz
feature_bullets: No More Pain - No Comb Detangling Spray makes removing knots and tangles easy and painless
Conditioning – made with a gentle blend of botanicals; this conditioning; leave-in spray helps undo matted knots without tears and hair breakage; Spritz as needed for smooth; shiny; frizz-free curls
Beautiful Scent - the herbaceous scent of Lemongrass is lush and refreshing
Easy to Use- spray all over wet curls and fingercomb it through; use anytime to tame curls and to add a light touch of moisture
Brand Promise – all products are 100% sulfate; paraben and silicone free; vegan; wheat-free and cruelty free
